term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - support-coated open-tubular (SCOT) column, in chromatography
term.title: support-coated open-tubular (SCOT) column

item.text: A version of a porous-layer open-tabular (PLOT) column in which the porous layer consists of support particles and was deposited from a suspension.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 819. 'Nomenclature for chromatography (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 831 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365040819)
